snippet.title: Saturnalia – Coming to Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Saturnalia is coming to Steam later this year! Wishlist it now! A Single-Player Survival Horror Adventure: play as a cast of characters exploring an isolated village haunted by an ancient ritual—but beware, its labyrinthine roads will change each time you lose all your characters.

New for the Steam release:
- First Person Mode
- Film Noir Mode
- Photo Mode
- New Accessibility Features
